items.name: Nimis
explicitMods: Projectiles are fired in random directions
flavourText: Too much of something is bad enough;
too much of nothing is just as tough.

items.name: Leadership's Price
explicitMods: You have Scorching Conflux, Brittle Conflux and Sapping Conflux while your two highest Attributes are equal
Cannot Ignite, Chill, Freeze or Shock
flavourText: "Remain poised. Remain balanced. Keep all the emotions of a lifetime caged.
Let only your enemies see the truth of your rage."

items.name: Rapture Weaver
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
explicitMods: +2 to Level of all Spell Skill Gems
craftedMods: Can have up to 3 Crafted Modifiers
+43% Critical Strike Multiplier while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
fracturedMods: +3 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -36% to Fire Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Ignite
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 72 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3580 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Recalls all minions that are following you to your location, and grants them a temporary life regeneration effect.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.

Deals 35% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second

explicitMods:

hybrid.secDescrText: Sacrifices a portion of your Life and Energy Shield to engulf you in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies for a duration. Your spell damage is increased while under this effect.

fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.
